languages.text: "Благословены будьте, дети Терры, и да не оставит вас свет Императора!"
"Be blessed, children of Terra, and may the Emperor's light never forsake you!"
languages.original_text: "Благословены будьте, дети Терры, и да не оставит вас свет Императора!"

traits.locale_text: "Be blessed, children of Terra, and may the Emperor's light never forsake you!"
"Be blessed, children of Terra, and may the Emperor's light never forsake you!"
"Be blessed, children of Terra, and may the Emperor's light never forsake you!"
"Be blessed, children of Terra, and may the Emperor's light never forsake you!"
"Be blessed, children of Terra, and may the Emperor's light never forsake you!"

languages.text: “接受祝福吧，泰拉的孩子们！愿帝皇的光辉永远与你们同在！”
languages.original_text: "Be blessed, children of Terra, and may the Emperor's light never forsake you!"

traits.locale_text: “接受祝福吧，泰拉的孩子们！愿帝皇的光辉永远与你们同在！”

languages.text: «¡Benditos seáis, hijos de Terra! ¡Que la luz del Emperador esté siempre con vosotros!».
languages.original_text: "Be blessed, children of Terra, and may the Emperor's light never forsake you!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Benditos seáis, hijos de Terra! ¡Que la luz del Emperador esté siempre con vosotros!».

languages.text: 「地球の子たち、祝福を受け入れよ。さすれば皇帝陛下の御光が永遠にお守りくださる！」
languages.original_text: "Be blessed, children of Terra, and may the Emperor's light never forsake you!"

traits.locale_text: 「地球の子たち、祝福を受け入れよ。さすれば皇帝陛下の御光が永遠にお守りくださる！」

languages.text: "Seid gesegnet, Kinder von Terra, und möge Euch das Licht des Imperators niemals verlassen!"
languages.original_text: "Be blessed, children of Terra, and may the Emperor's light never forsake you!"

traits.locale_text: "Seid gesegnet, Kinder von Terra, und möge Euch das Licht des Imperators niemals verlassen!"

languages.text: « Soyez bénis, enfants de Terra, et que la lumière de l'Empereur ne vous quitte jamais ! »
languages.original_text: "Be blessed, children of Terra, and may the Emperor's light never forsake you!"

traits.locale_text: « Soyez bénis, enfants de Terra, et que la lumière de l'Empereur ne vous quitte jamais ! »

languages.text: "Kutsanın Terra'nın çocukları, İmparator'un ışığı sizi hiç terk etmesin!"
languages.original_text: "Be blessed, children of Terra, and may the Emperor's light never forsake you!"

traits.locale_text: "Kutsamalar üzerinizde olsun Terra'nın çocukları, İmparator'un ışığı sizi asla terk etmesin!"
